events.message: I recently received my order but I want to request a refund because the product doesn't meet my expectations and I no longer need it.
The reported issue has been categorized under Refund based on the customer's request for money back.
The customer support agent Emily has been assigned to handle this refund case.
Hello! I'm Emily, and I'll be helping you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, could you confirm if the item has been opened or used, and share your order ID?
The item is unopened and in its original packaging. My order number is 789654321.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund process and send you a prepaid return label to your email shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and helpful solution. I look forward to receiving the return label.
The return label has been sent, and we will process your refund as soon as the item is received back at our warehouse.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the return label and if you need any further assistance with the refund.
Yes, I received the label and have shipped the package today. Thanks for your support!
We confirmed receipt of your returned item and processed the refund. You should see the amount back on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
We value your feedback. Please take a moment to complete our customer satisfaction survey regarding your recent refund experience.
Your refund case has been closed. Please contact us anytime if you need further assistance in the future.
This refund support case has been archived as resolved and closed.
